summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1614, for the improvement of Greenwood Avenue, from North 50th Street to North 51st Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks, with all necessary appurtenances for the proper drainage, under Ordinance No. 17177 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
